issue.title: [CF 1002] Tracking Hunter Traps Duration when Trigged
issue.body:
Trying to to track trap durations when triggered, Explosive traps works normally but Ice trap and Snake trap not, Any hint why?

What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. Create a Icon, Category Internal Cooldown
2. Use trap spell
3. Mobs trigger the trap

What do you expect to happen? What happens instead?

A Cooldown timer showing the duration of the trap, nothing happens with Ice trap and snake.

What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version)

7.0.2

Do you have an error log of what happened?

No.

Please provide any additional information below (including any export strings if applicable; see above.)

^1^T^SShowTimer^B ^SCLEUEvents^T ^SSPELL_CREATE^B ^t^SType^Sicd ^SSourceUnit^SSenx ^SShowTimerText^B ^SName^SExplosive~`Trap:~`20 ^SSettingsPerView^T ^Sicon^T ^STextLayout^Sicon1 ^STexts^T ^N2^S[Stacks:Hide(0)] ^t^t^t^SShowWhen^N1 ^SDestUnit^Starget ^SEnabled^B ^t^N70206^S~`~| ^Sicon^^

comments.body:
Ice Trap and Snake trap don't deal damage, so they won't trigger the Damage event for an internal cooldown icon.

Here is the string for Ice Trap: ^1^T^SShowTimer^B ^SCLEUEvents^T ^SSPELL_AURA_APPLIED^B ^t^SType^Scleu ^SName^SIce~`Trap ^SSourceUnit^Splayer ^SCLEUDur^N20 ^SEnabled^B ^SCLEUNoRefresh^B ^SShowTimerText^B ^t^N70206^S~`~| ^Sicon^^

I didn't give you one for snake trap because it will be removed from the game in 3 days. I did my testing for this on beta servers, so I can't be sure what event would be needed for snake trap.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Hm your string didnt work on live, and snake trap ill be changed to a glyph (http://wod.wowhead.com/spell=162827).

Removing the Player from Source unit(s) to check seems to fix it, but i suspect any trap from any source ill trigger right?

From what I noticed the debuff from the trap is not originated from the hunter, so i added this Exlusions to the Source unit(s) > Unit Reaction: Friendly, Unit Reaction: Neutral and even Unit Type: Player Character and the icon still worked.

Edited Oct 11, 2014

> Posted by CurseForge user Senxs

It might not be possible on live. Traps on live use super old tech that is finally being replaced in WoD, so I guess you'll have to wait before that icon will start working.

I'll look into snake trap as well.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Get it, tested on Beta and worked . Snake Trap Glyph on Internal Cooldown worked fine, better than the Combat Event, since if you already have the trap debuff, recasting the trap on the same target didnt refresh the timer.

Thanks


> Posted by CurseForge user Senxs
